meanings: outcasts common around the Kyoto region from the Kamakura period to the Edo period

lessons.japanese: 宿題は自分でやったの？
lessons.english: Did you do your homework by yourself?

lessons.japanese: 宿題はもう終わりましたか。
lessons.english: Have you finished doing your homework yet?

lessons.japanese: もう宿題をすませたの？
lessons.english: Have you finished doing your homework yet?

lessons.japanese: 宿題はもう終わったのですか。
lessons.english: Have you done all your homework?

lessons.japanese: もう宿題をすませたの？
lessons.english: Have you done all your homework?

lessons.japanese: 宿題は全部終わったの？
lessons.english: Have you done all your homework?

lessons.japanese: 君はちょうど宿題を終えたところだ。
lessons.english: You have just done your homework.

lessons.japanese: 君はこの宿題を明後日までに終わらせてしまわなければならない。
lessons.english: You must get this homework finished by the day after tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 君の宿題はいつ終わりますか。
lessons.english: When will your assignment be completed?

lessons.japanese: さっさと宿題をやりなさい。
lessons.english: You must do your homework at once.

lessons.japanese: あなたはすぐに宿題をしなければならない。
lessons.english: You must do your homework at once.
